00020 // constructor:
00021 template <class T>
00022 CViArray<T>::CViArray(int iSize) {
00023         m_vArray.resize(iSize);
00024         m_iLast = 0;
00025 }
00026

00028 template <class T>

00030

00033 // Render method --------------------------------------------------------------+
00034 template <class T>
00035 void CViArray<T>::Render(const CAVSystem *avSystem) const {
00036         avSystem->DrawDiagram(m_vArray.begin(), m_vArray.end());
00037 }
00038 
00039 // the [] operator ------------------------------------------------------------+
00040 template <class T>
00041 const T& CViArray<T>::operator [] (int iId) const {
00042         m_iLast = iId;
00043         return m_vArray[iId];
00044 }
